prompt: Create a website for a camera selling company, use dark theme
refinedPrompt: Design and develop a modern, responsive e-commerce website for a camera equipment company using a dark color scheme. The site should include a sleek homepage showcasing featured products, an intuitive navigation menu, product category pages with filtering options, individual product detail pages with high-quality images and specifications, a shopping cart, secure checkout process, user account management, and a contact page with a form for customer inquiries. Optimize the site for fast loading times and excellent user experience across all devices.
